result.html: Gurb amhlaidh duitseSame to you!
result.ponchtml: Gurb aṁlaiḋ duitseSame to you!

result.eng: There'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ga: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.orig: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.html: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeaḋ gar doṁsa nó duitse a ḃeiṫ ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.

result.eng: All you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ga: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.orig: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.html: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duitse aċ an tseanlánúin a ḃeiṫ sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.

result.eng: It's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
result.ga: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
result.orig: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
result.html: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú airIt's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
result.ponchtml: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár ṫúsaiġ tú airIt's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
